hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Amr:A man said to the Prophet, "Shall I participate in Jihad?" The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Are your parents living?" The man said, "Yes." the Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Do Jihad for their benefit

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يُجَاهِدُ إِلاَّ بِإِذْنِ الأَبَوَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: One should not go for Jihad without the permission of the parents
